sentences.sContent: Seafarers have long returned with tales — often dismissed as apocryphal — of the ocean abruptly reaching up and snatching at anything in its path.
sentences.sContent_eng: Seafarers have long returned with tales — often dismissed as apocryphal — of the ocean abruptly reaching up and snatching at anything in its path.
sentences.sCn: 长期以来，海员归来时，都会带来海洋骤然出现，所到之处片甲不留的故事---然而经常被当作是虚构的不为人相信。

words.tran: 作者（或真实性、权威性）可疑的著作；旁经
